batch_role: Problem Set Management and Group Service Implementation
key_features: Fetching user's group rooms with pagination
Handling group invites and join requests
Searching problem sets by title or description
Validation for creating and modifying problem sets
Encapsulating responses for problem sets and categories
project_hints: The project appears to be focused on a problem set management system, possibly for educational or competitive programming purposes.
User collaboration features and group management functionalities are integral to the system.
Efficient retrieval and management of problem sets and categories are emphasized.
